scripts.lint: npm run -s lint:scripts && npm run -s lint:styles
scripts.generate-free-plugin: cp -R build/wa-notifier-pro build/wa-notifier; mv build/wa-notifier/wa-notifier-pro.php build/wa-notifier/wa-notifier.php; sed -i '' 's/WA Notifier Pro/WA Notifier/g' build/wa-notifier/wa-notifier.php; sed -i '' 's/WA Notifier Pro/WA Notifier/g' build/wa-notifier/includes/classes/class-wa-notifier-dashboard.php
scripts.strip-free-pro-code: export LC_ALL=C; find build/wa-notifier/ -type f -exec sed -i '' '/==WA Notifier Pro Code Start==/,/==WA Notifier Pro Code End==/d' {} +; find build/wa-notifier-pro/ -type f -exec sed -i '' '/==WA Notifier Pro Code/d' {} +;
scripts.zip: zip -r build/wa-notifier.zip build/wa-notifier; zip -r build/wa-notifier-pro.zip build/wa-notifier-pro
scripts.deploy: rm -r build/*; yarn generate-pro-plugin; yarn generate-free-plugin; yarn strip-free-pro-code; yarn zip; yarn copy-to-free-site; yarn copy-to-pro-site;
